author: NG HAN GUAN and JOE McDONALD Associated Press
title: City at center of China's virus outbreak gradually revives
description: Shopkeepers in the city at the center of China’s virus outbreak are reopening but customers are scarce as authorities lift more of the anti-virus controls that kept tens of millions of people at home for two months
content:
WUHAN, China -- 
Shopkeepers in the city at the center of China's virus outbreak were reopening Monday but customers were scarce after authorities lifted more of the anti-virus controls that kept tens of millions of people at home for two months.
